wrote:
> Hello everybody,
>
> I have a little question because I have to write an article about
> JUnit for my studies.
>
> Now, I found out that the classes "TestCase" and "TestSuite"
> implements the interface "Test".
> My problem is, that I don't really know what this means exactly. I'm
> very new with JUnit.
>
> So I would be very happy, if anybody can give me a short answer to my
> question.
> Thanks a lot to all of you.

There is a good article at  
http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/cookstour/cookstour.htm.  Section #3  
specifically talks about the design of JUnit.
